dmca.title: ROLEX WATCH U.S.A., INC.
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Gaf Counsel [mailto:gafcounsel@gibney.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, June 14, 2005 9:23 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: RE: ROLEX WATCH U.S.A., INC.

June 14, 2005


BY EMAIL: copyright@theplanet.com
AND FIRST CLASS MAIL
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
1333 North Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207

RE:  ROLEX WATCH U.S.A., INC.

To ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.:

This firm is general counsel to Rolex Watch U.S.A., Inc. ("Rolex"), the
owners of the federally registered Rolex Trademarks: ROLEX, PRESIDENT,
SUBMARINER, YACHT-MASTER, DAYTONA, GMT-MASTER, DATEJUST and Crown Device
(among others).

We are writing to request your assistance with a website hosted by your
service that is selling counterfeit Rolex products.

The www.megaprofit.gr/rologas website offers counterfeit and infringing
Rolex watches for sale.  Such illegal use of the Rolex Trademarks is likely
to cause confusion and constitutes counterfeiting, trademark infringement
and dilution of Rolex's intellectual property rights in violation of both
federal and state laws. 

Pursuant to ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.'s policies and the
requirements of The Digital Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA") 1, please note
the following: 

1. Signature of the undersigned set forth below.

2. www.megaprofit.gr/rologas is offering for sale counterfeit Rolex
merchandise and the offer for sale and the sale of counterfeit merchandise
is prohibited by federal law (15 U.S.C.
